_header: I yield myself to you save me my life
Subjects: love, vicissitudes of; lovers, addresses to beloved; envoys
_description: The trials of Love, by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
I yelde my silf to yow saue me my lijfAnd stede of good fynaunce
                    my poor hert…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Wherfore to sone ye kan not don hit noIf evir wel ye were on
                    loue bithought
